scripts.copy:index: cd ../../../full-stack-open-part-3-backend && rm -rf index.js && cd ../full-stack-open-course/part3/phonebook-backend-copy && cp -r index.js ../../../full-stack-open-part-3-backend
scripts.copy:json: cd ../../../full-stack-open-part-3-backend && rm -rf package.json && cd ../full-stack-open-course/part3/phonebook-backend-copy && cp -r package.json ../../../full-stack-open-part-3-backend
scripts.copy:readme: cd ../../../full-stack-open-part-3-backend && rm -rf README.md && cd ../full-stack-open-course/part3/phonebook-backend-copy && cp -r README.md ../../../full-stack-open-part-3-backend
scripts.copy:dist: cd ../../../full-stack-open-part-3-backend && rm -rf dist && cd ../full-stack-open-course/part3/phonebook-backend-copy && cp -r dist ../../../full-stack-open-part-3-backend
scripts.copy:full: npm run copy:index && npm run copy:json && npm run copy:readme && npm run copy:dist && npm run install:json
